actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to provide for the induction of individuals, during the period beginning July 1, 1975, and ending June 30, 1977 for training and service in the Armed Forces.

summary.text: Re-establishes the military draft for a two-year period. Provides for the induction of individuals, during the period beginning July 1, 1975, and ending June 30, 1977, for training and service in the Armed Forces.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the induction of individuals, during the period beginning July 1, 1975, and ending June 30, 1977 for training and service in the Armed Forces.
